scenes.start.welcome:
Hello, @{username}! I'm Smile-Tube and I can help you to find random videos from you favorite channel.

To start using me, just press a button from the menu below
scenes.searchRandom.start:
Welcome to the random video searcher!
*To start finding random videos, enter the channel name firstly.*
scenes.shared.fetchedAllVideos:
Done! Fetched last ${videoCount} videos.
Finding random videos...
scenes.shared.fetchMoreTitle: You can fetch 10 more videos. Press the more button below
scenes.errors.notFound: Cannot find ${message} channel. Please, try another channel
shared.somethingWentWrong: ❌ Something went wrong. Please, try one more time...
